##### Create a view for the data, joining harmonised tables where necessary

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_document
AS
SELECT DISTINCT 
MD.DataId	                            AS documentId,
MD.CaseNodeId	                        AS caseId,
DT.caseReference	                    AS caseRef,
MD.documentReference	                AS documentReference,
MD.Version                              AS version,
AMD.examinationRefNo	                AS examinationRefNo,
MD.Name	                                AS filename,
MD.Name	                                AS originalFilename,
MD.DataSize	                            AS size,
AMD.mime	                            AS mime,
AMD.DocumentURI	                        AS documentURI,
AMD.DocumentURI		                    AS publishedDocumentURI,
AMD.Path                                AS path,
MD.virusCheckStatus	                    AS virusCheckStatus,
AMD.fileMd5	                            AS fileMD5,
MD.CreateDate                   	    AS dateCreated,
MD.ModifyDate                   	    AS lastModified,
LOWER(MD.CaseworkType)	                AS caseType,
CASE
    WHEN AMD.redactedStatus = ' '   
    THEN NULL
    ELSE AMD.redactedStatus                
END                                     AS redactedStatus,
CASE
    WHEN MD.PublishedStatus = 'Depublished'
    THEN 'unpublished'
    ELSE REPLACE(
        LOWER(MD.PublishedStatus),
        ' ',
        '_')
END                  	                AS publishedStatus,
MD.DatePublished                        AS datePublished,
MD.DocumentType	                        AS documentType,
CASE
    WHEN AMD.securityClassification = ' '
    THEN NULL
    ELSE AMD.securityClassification
END	                                    AS securityClassification,
DT.SourceSystem	                        AS sourceSystem,
CASE
    WHEN AMD.origin  = ' '
    THEN NULL
    ELSE AMD.origin
END	                                    AS origin,
AMD.owner                               AS owner,
MD.Author	                            AS author,
NULL                                    AS authorWelsh,
MD.Representative	                    AS representative,
MD.DocumentDescription	                AS description,
NULL                                    AS descriptionWelsh,
CASE
    WHEN MD.DocumentCaseStage = "Developer's Application"
    THEN 'developers_application'
    WHEN MD.DocumentCaseStage = 'Post decision'
    THEN 'post_decision'
    ELSE LOWER(MD.DocumentCaseStage)	            
END                                     AS documentCaseStage,
MD.Filter1	                            AS filter1,
NULL                                    AS filter1Welsh,
MD.Filter2	                            AS filter2,
MD.ParentID	                            AS horizonFolderId,
NULL	                                AS transcriptId	

FROM odw_curated_db.nsip_data DT
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.document_meta_data   AS MD
    ON DT.casereference = MD.caseReference
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data    AS AMD
    ON MD.DataID = AMD.DocumentID 
        AND AMD.Version = MD.Version 
        AND AMD.Size = MD.DataSize
WHERE AMD.IsActive = 'Y' 
    AND MD.IsActive = 'Y'
